builds.name: Eternal Solar Inferno
builds.concept: Burn-focused build using Eternal Flame to apply infinite burn scaling combined with Eye of the Sun for automatic Solar Light, with Pain splash spreading fire damage across crowds
builds.playstyle: Fire specialist that creates infinite burn stacks and triggers automatic empowered attacks with massive AoE splash

memories.name: Pillar of Flame
memories.rationale: Eternal Flame applies burn curse and scales damage with burn stacks (20pt synergy with Eye of the Sun), Eye of the Sun triggers Solar Light on burning enemies, Fever infects with Fever for chain explosions scaling with fire stacks (22pt synergy with Eternal Flame)

memories.name: Immolation
memories.rationale: Embertail adds ricochet fire damage and scales 8% per burning enemy (20pt synergy with Eternal Flame, 20pt with Eye of the Sun), Charcoal adds fragments to burning enemies, Sulfur converts damage to fire and increases fire DoT by 50% (20pt synergy with Eternal Flame)

memories.name: Ignite
memories.rationale: Pain adds 40% AoE splash to Ignite's fire damage for massive burn spread across crowds (previously unused essence), Clemency provides 4% leech healing, Momentum reduces cooldown per attack

memories.name: Tales of Hellfire
memories.rationale: Scorch fires 3 fireballs, Vortex periodically fires fireballs, Quicksilver enhances mobility with 30% MS on fire damage

builds.strategy: Pillar of Flame with Eternal Flame+Fever creates the chain explosion loop (22pt synergy): every fire hit applies burn curse, and Fever creates cascading explosions that scale with fire stacks. Eye of the Sun triggers automatic Solar Light every 20 seconds on burning enemies (20pt synergy with Eternal Flame). Immolation with Embertail ricochets fire to spread burns everywhere (20pt synergies with both Eternal Flame and Eye of the Sun), while Sulfur adds 50% fire DoT. Ignite with Pain now splashes 40% AoE on every fire hit, dramatically improving burn spread in dense packs. Tales of Hellfire creates constant fire ring damage. Focus on applying burn stacks to as many enemies as possible - the build creates infinite damage scaling through burn stacks.
strengths: Eternal Flame+Fever chain explosion loop (22pt synergy)
Embertail+Eye of the Sun mass burn detonation (20pt synergy)
Embertail+Eternal Flame ricochet fire spread (20pt synergy)
40% AoE splash via Pain on Ignite for massive burn spread
Infinite damage scaling with burn stacks
Automatic empowered attacks through Eye of the Sun
weaknesses: Requires burn application for maximum effectiveness
Less effective against fire-resistant enemies
Requires multiple legendary/unique fire essences
Positioning dependent for optimal burn spread

Extra projectiles from Accuracy for ranged damage

Complex resource management across 3 elements
Positioning dependent
Weaker early game before Faith stacks and health pool

builds.strategy: This build achieves near-zero effective cooldowns on Lightning Strike through triple CDR stacking. Flow reduces Lightning Strike's cooldown 6% every time ANY memory deals Light damage. Insight adds 200% Light damage to every memory hit (triggering Flow on every 3-second cycle). Momentum+Efficiency (15pt synergy) on Chain Lightning adds attack-based and flat CDR. Self-Writing Story auto-casts all memories, and each auto-cast builds Thunder stacks AND deals Light damage that feeds Flow. Pure White fires 3+ Light projectiles every 10 seconds (16pt synergy with Shock), and Accuracy doubles projectile output - every projectile deals Light damage that triggers Flow. Opportunity on Valiant Heart reduces Dodge cooldown by 3 seconds per cast, enabling more frequent Distorting Sprint for Thunder stack building. The result: Lightning Strike cycles in under 2 seconds, each cast consuming 5-7 Thunder stacks for devastating lightning barrages.
